channel.title: Posts on Places to visit in Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Places to visit in Europe

item.title: Paris Tour : Most visited monuments in Paris
item.description: Bonjour! I know that you’ve heard a lot about Paris and how beautiful it is. You have always dreamed to watch the sunset while looking at the Eiffel Tower (better in couple ^^) ! Who have not been curious about walking at the champs élysées street and taking fancy photos. Paris is the most visited cities in the world! It is full of amazing touristic monuments that attract millions of people all over the year.

item.title: Top 13 things to do in Barcelona
item.description: Barcelona is the capital of Catalonia’s region and the second biggest city in Spain. They called it “the city that never sleeps”. It is known for culture, architecture and mild weather. Let’s take a tour in Barcelona! 1. Sagrada Familia An unfinished church designed by the catalan architect Antoni Gaudí. The construction has started on 1882 and it is expected to be completed by 2026. Its unique architecture and special design have made it the modern symbol of Barcelona.

item.title: Best 20 things to do in Prague
item.description: Prague is the capital of Czech republic and one of the best cities of Europe. Founded in the 9th century, it is full of history, culture and civilization. In this post, I will show you the best 20 things to do in Prague. 1. Walk in the city The City center of Prague looks like a real museum. You will fall in love with the awesome architectures, the colors of the of the buildings and the gray stones streets.

item.title: 6 things to do in Hallstatt
item.description: Would you like to spend a day with beautiful landscapes? Hallstatt is the perfect place to do that! An austrian city on a lake, surrounded by alps mountain from all sides. Hallstatt is famous for extracting salt from mountains long time ago. In this post, you will get a list of best things to do in Hallstatt: 1. Walking in the city One of the oldest alps city, Hallstatt is full of history and architecture.
